title: Betplay Group
author: Betplay Group
content: Hop to win when you join Wazdan’s Easter celebration called Easter Drop! This is a 14-day network campaign, and this fun-filled tournament will take place from April 3 to 16, 2023. A prize fund worth EUR 250,000, divided into 2,500 mystery boxes, is waiting for the winners who can crack the lucky Easter eggs.In this tourney, there is no set minimum bet requirement, and cash drops are random. You can thus find as many Easter eggs as you like. While playing the qualifying games, the more you wager, the greater your chances of winning are.Campaign ScheduleApril 3 at 9:00 a.m. CET to April 16 at 11:59 p.m. CET.To join, you can play any of Pragmatic Play’s participating games like 9 Burning Dragons, 9 Coins, 9 Coins Grand Gold Edition, 9 Tigers, Back To The 70s, Beach Party Hot, Beauty Fruity, Black Hawk Deluxe, Black Horse, Burning Reels, Burning Stars, Butterfly Lovers, Choco Reels, Colin The Cat, Corrida Romance Deluxe, 9 Burning Stars, 9 Coins 1,000 Edition, 9 Lions, Arcade, Bars &7s, Beach Party, Bell Wizard, Black Hawk, Black Horse Deluxe, Burning Stars 3, Burning Sun, Captain Shark, Clover Lady, Corrida Romance, Crazy Cars, Hungry Shark, In The Forest, Infinity Hero, Jack On Hold, Jackpot Builders, Jack's Ride, Jelly Reels, Jumping Fruits, Kickoff, Larry The Leprechaun, Los Muertos, and many more!If you have any questions concerning the campaign, please get in touch with us via our live chat service.
